Name: ENDLESS WAR
About the game: Introduction to the game Players need to control a tank and fight side by side with friendly forces to destroy as many enemies as possible. Tanks are divided into two attack modes, firing powerful missiles or very fast bullets. Whenever you defeat an enemy, you can also seize materials to obtain gold coins and use it as a tank modification. Destroy as many enemies as possible to unlock achievements! featured part At present, the game has set up a total of 3 maps, which are divided into grassland, mountain and plain. You can fight on different terrain! The tank can be modified in five ways to improve its defense, movement speed, missile power, material acquisition, and the flexibility of the battery. Although the game is a single player game, it will not fight alone when entering the battlefield. Enemy and friendly forces will be generated in the game scene. Friendly forces will help you fight. When friendly forces have low HP, you can also defeat friendly forces to obtain additional points! mechanism The game mechanism, like the name of the game, belongs to endless mode. The traditional clearance game, when all the levels pass, it is difficult to raise interest and play again. This game can let you enjoy the fun of fighting all the time, and with the improvement of the progress of the game, it can also improve the ability of tanks in all aspects.
